特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: Spring Intensive English is a twice-a-week course designed to acclimate advanced proficiency first-year students to standard university English course expectations. Students will actively use English as a tool to complete various types of tasks. This will allow students to improve their English skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking), as well as other skills, such as organizing ideas, group work, public speaking etc.
授業方法:
This class will be completed entirely in English. This course aims to improve students’ overall English abilities in all facets of language competency, thus students can anticipate extensive group and pair work, revolving around discussion and critical thinking, and synthesizing and presenting ideas.

Classes will be taught face to face with possible on demand due to emergency situations.

Students will need a Gmail account to access Google Classroom. The majority of the assignments and quizzes/short tests will be collected online. IMPORTANT: You must have space in your Google Drive. If your Google Drive is full (15GB) of photos, videos, or other documents, you will not be able to see class material or assignments.
